job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Are a born consultant that understand customer business needs and translate them into end-to-end technical solutions
   * Use Python to deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud
   * Explore state-of-the art ML research and drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks
   * Are responsible for the high-quality delivery of your team's projects
   * Technically guide junior ML engineers
   * Deliver technical workshops for clients
   * Leverage your expertise to help sales qualify and land exciting projects
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

* Are a born consultant that understand customer business needs and translate them into end-to-end technical solutions
   * Use Python to deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud
   * Explore state-of-the art ML research and drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks
   * Are responsible for the high-quality delivery of your team's projects
   * Technically guide junior ML engineers
   * Deliver technical workshops for clients
   * Leverage your expertise to help sales qualify and land exciting projects

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes deploying production-ready pipelines and ML models on the cloud using Python, exploring ML research, and technically guiding junior engineers. While it mentions consulting and client interaction, the core focus remains on building and deploying ML solutions, aligning with the 'ML Engineer' profile's emphasis on algorithm development, data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and productionizing prototypes.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'born consultant that understand customer business needs and translate them into end-to-end technical solutions' directly reflects the ability to grasp business context and map it to technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: understand customer business needs and translate them into end-to-end technical solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deploy production ready pipelines' indicates the responsibility for building and maintaining data pipelines.
The phrase 'deploy production ready ... ML models' directly relates to the core task of creating and deploying machine learning models.

The phrase 'Explore state-of-the art ML research and drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks' implies research, evaluation, and adoption of new modeling techniques and tools.
job_tasks.phrase: Explore state-of-the art ML research and drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud' suggests the software development aspect of making models and pipelines operational in a cloud environment.
job_tasks.phrase: deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud' implies the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining models in a production environment.
job_tasks.phrase: deploy production ready pipelines and ML models on the Cloud

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'born consultant' and 'Deliver technical workshops for clients' indicates strong communication and client-facing skills.
The phrase 'Deliver technical workshops for clients' directly points to communication and teaching skills.
The phrase 'help sales qualify and land exciting projects' implies collaboration with sales teams and communication of technical value.
job_tasks.phrase: help sales qualify and land exciting projects

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'translate them into end-to-end technical solutions' suggests problem-solving by creating comprehensive technical answers to business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: translate them into end-to-end technical solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Are responsible for the high-quality delivery of your team's projects' implies a focus on delivering results and ensuring quality.
job_tasks.phrase: Are responsible for the high-quality delivery of your team's projects

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks' shows initiative and a proactive approach to adopting new technologies.
job_tasks.phrase: drive internal evaluation and adoption of cutting edge tools and frameworks

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Technically guide junior ML engineers' indicates leadership and ownership of team development.
